Strangled by cable

Strangled by cable — Aereo, the company that offered on-demand DVR video, has applied for bankruptcy, after being sued by the cable companies. It was a clever attempt to circumvent the monopolized and bundled nature of TV, but there was no way they were going to last in the current environment.

Published November 20 2014

Enjoy your day.
